title: Riot employees!
body: Hey guys I was wondering if any of yous would like to play some norms? :)

replies.body: Just begin a discussion including lols and rumble x tristy (if they're still here) and intiate a community match vs rito, they may respond and set a date, we had 2-3 games before then pax aus, Armageddon and all that happended meaning it stopped
They used to have community games...
